description: Magami Eiko (A-ko), a red-haired girl who seems to be near invulnerable with magical superhuman speed and strength, is the heroine of the series and lives in Graviton City, Japan. A-ko is usually very friendly, cheerful, and polite and always tries to lead a normal life despite her unusual lineage. However, she does have a fiery temper and is very dangerous when angered. She has a large appetite and a tendency to oversleep on school days. Her constant friend is http://anidb.net/ch19896 [C-ko], whom she has known since kindergarten. Although A-ko can sometimes be frustrated with her, she truly loves C-ko.
name: Magami Eiko
